comment: Sweetest person ever. Her class was really easy as long as you completed the study guide the test was the exact same and she is always willing to help if you have trouble

I loved this professor, so caring and good at explaining topics you don't fully understand. She helps you out a lot so if you need that in math, trust me and take her. She takes the time to make sure each student is doing well.

she is a very nice lady and you can tell she really cares about her students. I would take her again but the courseload was awful. there were SO many topics so she had to teach really fast. I failed every exam except the final. I honestly don't blame her because she did the best she could plus math is my worst subject.

She goes over the topics very fast, but she is usually clear on most things. ALEKS is the main source of everything besides our tests which are in person. She also gives you like ten attempts for each quiz to make sure you pass. The class itself isn't that hard, just pay attention and complete the homework.

She was a great teacher to have to teach College Algebra, and I'm taking her again for Pre-Cal. She will help you with any problem you have. She grades fast, and she is very kind to her students with her being a math teacher and all. I really liked how her lectures went over the homework that would be due the same day. And do homework 2 weeks ahead
